step.title: End of life: Removing battery from vehicle

paragraph.htmltext: When the battery is removed from the vehicle care shal be taken to avoid electrocution when handling the HV-components. Before the removing can start, the server disconnect should be removed. Technicians should use the appropriate high voltage tools and gloves.

If the pack which need to be extracted is damaged, extra care should be taken. In a damaged pack gas formation can occur. To avoid sever injuries caused by rupture of the pack and gas release, the technicians should wear the appropriate personal protection measures (e.g. safety glasses). Care should be taken to avoid electrical abuse. This could lead to gas formation and temperature increase at the connectors.
